snippet: Globalfest, with 12 artists on three stages, presented 21st-century world music as an accelerating fusion, with a superb African contingent this year.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performances at 10th annual Globalfest world music festival at Webster Hall.
lead_paragraph: Globalfest, with 12 artists on three stages, presented 21st-century world music as an accelerating fusion, with a superb African contingent this year.

headline.seo: Globalfest, World Musicians at Webster Hall
headline.main: World Music Informed by the Past and Fiery in the Here and Now
headline.print_headline: World Music Informed by the Past and Fiery in the Here and Now
